survey_name: Online Coding Bootcamp Graduate Outcomes Survey
survey_brief: Assess post-completion experiences of coding bootcamp graduates to improve career outcomes and curriculum effectiveness

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall curriculum quality of the coding bootcamp?
questions.client_notes: Use standard 5-point Likert scale for consistent benchmarking
questions.scripter_notes: Radio button horizontal layout, required field

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall curriculum quality of the coding bootcamp?

questions.question_text: Which programming languages did you become proficient in through the bootcamp?
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections with 'Other' field validation
questions.scripter_notes: Checkbox grid with text input for 'Other'

script.question_text: Which programming languages did you become proficient in through the bootcamp?

questions.question_text: How many months after graduation did you secure full-time employment in tech?
questions.client_notes: Include explicit 'still seeking' option to capture unemployment data
questions.scripter_notes: Radio button vertical layout with progress bar display

script.question_text: How many months after graduation did you secure full-time employment in tech?

questions.question_text: What specific aspects of the career support services were most valuable to you?
questions.client_notes: Use text analysis to identify common themes in responses

script.question_text: What specific aspects of the career support services were most valuable to you?

questions.question_text: How would you rate the relevance of technical skills learned to your current job requirements?
questions.scripter_notes: Interactive slider scale with numeric labels

script.question_text: How would you rate the relevance of technical skills learned to your current job requirements?

questions.question_text: Which of these non-technical skills did the program effectively develop?

script.question_text: Which of these non-technical skills did the program effectively develop?

questions.question_text: What percentage salary increase did you achieve post-bootcamp compared to your pre-bootcamp earnings?
questions.client_notes: Sensitive question - ensure anonymous response handling
questions.scripter_notes: Radio buttons with 'Prefer not to answer' optional

script.question_text: What percentage salary increase did you achieve post-bootcamp compared to your pre-bootcamp earnings?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this coding bootcamp to others?
questions.client_notes: Include NPS calculation in backend analysis
questions.scripter_notes: Radio button matrix with emoji scale

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this coding bootcamp to others?

questions.question_text: What additional topics should be included in future curriculum updates?
questions.client_notes: Use keyword cloud visualization for analysis
questions.scripter_notes: Open text field with AI-powered suggestion prompts

script.question_text: What additional topics should be included in future curriculum updates?
